moves.1. d4: Real quick game, white is sharp & to the point.
moves.3. Bf4: Declined want to continue with development.
moves.5. c3 a6 6. Bd3 Nc6: ?! No where to really go as all outposts are covered.
moves.9... O-O: Black opts to castle quickly as white comes forward.
moves.10. Qf3: White brings queen into action early.
moves.10... Re8 11. Qg3: G7 is not defended, white applies alittle pressue
moves.11... g5: Black doesnt like threat so attacks bishop & defends at same time.
moves.12. Bxg5: Bishop sac'd for 2 pawns and total destruction of defensive pawns
moves.13... Kh8: wrong way!!! (even if King had gone to F8 he still would have been in poor situation)
moves.14. Nxf7#: With a fork on the queen to boot!
